data.actual_result: GIF indicator is missing. Hovering mouse over the GIF will still play it, but resets to 1st frame when not hovering, unlike GIFs from other sources
data.expected_result: GIF indicator is shown in the right-upper corner of the GIF
data.short_description: Uploaded GIFs are missing a GIF indicator
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure Automatically play GIFs when Discord is focused option is disabled - Upload a GIF file (or post a link to a GIF, uploaded to Discord servers)
